reviews.text: Although size of the burgers is relatively small, they are tasty. Considering the prices, this is a rear find in the heart of Manhattan.
This was probably the best burger experience I've had since Covid came and effed up my life
Must go when in Hell‚Äôs Kitchen

You don‚Äôt think $9 per this is too much?
And it‚Äôs not fair for 10 small pc of potato.

Ich war gestern bei Lovely‚Äôs Old Fashioned und habe dort ein Patty Melt mit Mushrooms bestellt ‚Äì absolut gro√üartig! Das Fleisch war super saftig, das Brot perfekt getoastet und die Kombination mit den Pilzen einfach himmlisch. Man merkt, dass hier mit Leidenschaft gekocht wird. Der Besitzer war unglaublich freundlich und echt authentisch ‚Äì so ein herzliches Gespr√§ch hat man selten in einem Burgerladen. Wenn ich l√§nger hier w√§re, w√ºrde das definitiv mein Stammplatz f√ºr Burger werden. Klare Empfehlung!
Top Burger! Probiert unbedingt den Big O!

The food is great, exactly what you‚Äôre looking for after a couple brews, and the staff is friendly and always warm. This is my third time here and I‚Äôll definitely be back. The old-school counter seating completes the experience.
Great burger and hot dog, and very vibey little shop with cool kind staff.
Swiss burger with mushroom lettuce and onion was out of this world
the hot dog is pretty mid for $9

Solid burger that's a cut above most of the chains.

Freshly made to order and comes out quick.

On the smaller side but satisfying nonetheless
Hamburguer delicioso e excelente atendimento.
FOOD WAS GOOD BUT IDK ABOUT THE PRICE
All around great place‚Ä¶great food - made to order and hot, great team, fun experience. Will definitely come back for a casual hamburger.

Really solid burger, thin patties and the bun is soft and full of flavor. Not a big fan of the fries as they are cut a little thicker but they still taste good. Would give 5 stars if they had a good chocolate milkshake to go with the burger.

Lovely‚Äôs Old Fashioned is hands-down one of the best burger spots in New York City ‚Äî a true Hell‚Äôs Kitchen hidden gem that brings back that old-school diner charm with a modern twist. The moment you walk in, you smell the burgers sizzling on the grill and feel that cozy 1950s burger joint energy that‚Äôs hard to find anymore.

The burgers are everything you want: juicy, perfectly smashed, cooked to perfection, and served on a soft potato bun. I had the Charlotte‚Äôs Special, and it was unreal crispy fried onions, that signature sauce, and just the right amount of sweetness and tang. The sidewinder fries were golden, crisp, and addictive, and even the onion rings were top-tier. Everything here tastes like it was made with love and attention.

Service is friendly and fast you can tell the team cares about their food and the customers. The space is small but full of heart, with counter seating that lets you watch your burger being made right in front of you. It‚Äôs got that authentic New York burger shop feel that makes you want to come back again and again.

Prices are fair (especially for NYC), portions are generous, and the quality speaks for itself. Whether you‚Äôre a burger lover, a foodie exploring Manhattan, or just someone looking for a great local spot near Times Square or Hell‚Äôs Kitchen, Lovely‚Äôs Old Fashioned is absolutely worth the stop.

Lovely‚Äôs delivers what every great NYC burger joint should: real ingredients, bold flavor, and good energy. This is easily one of the top burgers in New York City no gimmicks, just great food made the old-fashioned way.
I went on a Wednesday evening to grab a solo dinner. Double cheeseburger and onion rings. Quality of ingredients, service, price, and environment were top-notch. High recommend the smashburgers here.
Place could be better if it had better employees working at the front. Foods heavily greasy, tastes like they dump the patties grease fat into the fryer.

Stopped by for a quick to-go dessert, and they delivered (and then some)!  The pistachio chocolate bundt was absolutely delicious ‚Äî we‚Äôll be back for more!

Update ‚Äî I‚Äôve been back (again and again) and every single thing on this menu hits!  The fries, the onion rings, that pistachio Bundt that initially brought me in the door ‚Ä¶ get it all. The SLEEPER, the mushreuben, is easily a top 5 most delicious and satisfying vegetarian sandwich.

My favorite place to bring/send out of towners for a pre-show bite.

1st time here & I'm definitely a fan! Tye was very kind & helpful. The burgers were cooked to perfection. It was so juicy & full of flavor. And the fries were so delicious üòã
If I'm ever back in this area again, I'll definitely stop here 1st.
Great burgers and excellent fries + onion rings at an incredible price for the area. The bar seating is charming, and the guys running the show are hella chill. Top notch hospitality.
Hamburguesa cl√°sica, deliciosa y a buen precio! Si est√°n por esta zona es la mejor opci√≥n!
The double cheeseburger is super Small, no toppings. $22+ tax with an order of fries. This was a delivery
Delicious burgers and nice staff. I totally recommend!
BEST BURGER IN MANHATTAN

Sehr saftige Burger und Sandwiches, einfach authentisch und richtig lecker. Das Personal war flei√üig und freundlich. Wir mussten nicht lange warten und das Preis-Leistungsverh√§ltnis war in Ordnung :)

The restaurant handles both classics and innovations well. Staff members are never too busy to help. Standard items have fair prices, though extras make it expensive. This place understands good taste. This restaurant exceeded high expectations.
Small but cozy place with delivious burgers, fries and onionrings.
Fantastic food!

I would avoid this place. They push you from Seamless to their own app then default to adding a huge tip for pickup that is difficult to remove and a $10 fee if you switch to delivery. Food has also gone downhill since opening.
Best Burger (with good bacon) and Onionrings I've ever had. Very friendly.
The most American burger I‚Äôve ever eaten and it‚Äôs amazing! I will recommend this place to all my friends who are visiting NY!
One of the greatest discoveries of along ninth Avenue of the year

Magificas hamburguesas a buen precio servidas y preparadas por gente estupenda y amable que te hacen sentir como en casa
Un 10
No se vayan de New York sin probarlas
DELICIOUS, pan robi jedzenie na oczach klient√≥w, super experience
Best of the best! Love it!
Visiting from KC. Best hot dog I've ever had. üôåüèæ Get the Lovely Snappy‚Ä¶

Became one of my favorite burger in NY!
It‚Äôs a simple and traditional place , but burger and fries were just AMAZING!

Amazing burgers
I confirm, the best in town, cooked with tradition, tasty
Fries are also special, Onion rings delicious
Top notch. Ordered the Patty Melt, comes with cheese üßÄ onion üßÖ mushroom üçÑ‚Äçüü´ and pickles ü•í on rye bread. Delicious üòã
I purchased 3 cheese burgers with fried onions and French fries the fries were ok but the grill man OVER COOKED THE BURGERS BURNT THE ONIONS ON MY BURGERS IT MADE THE BURGERS HORRIBLE.
Best Burger and don‚Äòt miss the Hotdog with Sauerkraut, Delicious!
One of the best burgers I've ever had, and I'm from the Midwest. Amazing onion rings. The Charlotte had so much flavor. Good Lord!

If you like burgers, you have to go here. Last weekend I ordered two burgers for my daughter and myself. Besides the great taste and the fact they make it fresh in front of you, you can customize your burger entirely.
Tourist visiting from out of town. The first bite of each item was GREAT . Like OMG great. Perfect amount of each ingredient with every bite

I ordered their cheese burger, and their Sidewinder French Fries.

As you can see in the photos, their French fries are unique shaped. They are also crispy, and soft on the inside. They are some of the very best french fries around.

I highly recommend their burgers as well.

The staff are nice, as well as professional.

I can certainly see why this restaurant is so popular.

I ordered my food at the restaurant it's self.

Most of the people pre-ordered their food over the internet. They filled those orders fast.
Ty was an amazing server. Very sweet and made felt comfortable to come back. Best burger you can get at 2 am.  Also great hot dogs
The black guy at the counter named TY is the most authentic friendly person I have ever met! Lovely‚Äôs has the best burgers! Patty Melt fire üî•
Ty was the best part. And that‚Äôs saying something bc this is BY FAR the best burger in Hell‚Äôs Kitchen. Always hits the spot exactly.
Hot fresh and good flavor.

Stopped at Lovely's during my trip to NYC and wow. The food was delicious. They make it right there in front of you and the food combos are great. Staff was friendly. Best patty melt I've had, the fries were delicious and perfectly salted. So good that we had to come back for another burger later that night. My only regret is not getting the onions rings.

üçî Lovely‚Äôs Old Fashioned ‚Äì Smash burgers & vibes √† l‚Äôam√©ricaine

üìç 642 9th Ave, New York, NY 10036

Install√© en plein c≈ìur de Hell‚Äôs Kitchen, ce petit comptoir new-yorkais √† l‚Äôancienne envoie du tr√®s lourd : pas de salle, juste des tabourets align√©s face √† la cuisine, un comptoir en inox, et une brigade en T-shirts r√©tro qui smash les burgers √† la minute.

üßæ Au menu :

üçî Smash burger juteux, cheddar fondant, bun moelleux
üçü Fries torsad√©es √† tremper dans le ketchup et mayo
üßÖ Onion rings bien croustillants, dor√©s √† souhait
ü•§ Soda vintage (Fanta, Coke en bouteille en verre)

Le tout servi dans des paniers verts r√©tro, sur du papier marqu√© ‚ÄúLovely‚Äôs Old Fashioned‚Äù ‚Äî on croirait un d√©cor de film.

üë®‚Äçüç≥ Les cuisiniers s‚Äôactivent juste devant vous, ambiance fast-paced et sourires compris. L‚Äôendroit est petit, mais l‚Äôexp√©rience est grande.

---

‚≠ê √Ä tester absolument si tu aimes :

‚úî Les burgers simples mais ultra ma√Ætris√©s
‚úî L‚Äôambiance de comptoir fa√ßon USA 60s
‚úî Le vrai go√ªt de New York, sans artifices.

We had two smash burger and loved its. We especially loved the one we order without sauce and with an add on of tomato. One of the best burger we had in NYC so far. The staff was also nice and helpful.
Loved the giant beer battered onion rings. The burger though small hit the spot and cooked perfectly. Small shop with only a few counter seating, small menu offering great burgers.

Loved everything about Lovely's. The food, the service, the old school burger joint felt spectacular. The Snappy Dog was the standout for me; getting onions and sauerkraut grilled before topped on the dog was a genius move.

Top tier burger place, very comparable to places like 7th St Burger and Hamburger America. Slightly saucier and slightly less smash burger-y this place is definitely worth going out of the way for. Among the burger places in nyc they also have the most unique fries, a crossover between a steak cut and a chip. Along with their onion rings which I haven‚Äôt seen done better.

Die Burger sind traditionell und extrem lecker! Die Stimmung ist so, wie hab es auch in einem amerikanischen Burger w√ºnscht. Tolle Musik, tolle Stimmung.
Die Burger sind von der Gr√∂√üe √ºberschaubar, aber die Preis Leistung stimmt. Absolute Empfehlung und wir w√ºrden nochmal hier her kommen.

Great lunch spot to grab a bite to eat and keep it moving. Very convenient on 9th Ave and 45th street. Small place but there's seats to eat and enjoy your burger and fries or onion rings. Very delicious burgers you see them make everything right infront of you. Great service from all the staff members.

Pedimos o Charlotte's Special com adicional de alface e tomate e batata frita. Lanche muito bom, feito na hora, assim como as batatas. Recomendo!
O ambiente √© pequeno e voc√™ come no balc√£o. Se preferir, pode optar por uma mesa na cal√ßada.
O atendimento foi muito bom.

Lovely‚Äôs Old Fashioned in New York, NY. Handmade with Love these burgers and hotdogs have to be on your list. I love a good cheeseburger and these cheeseburgers were so juicy and delicious! I love the old school vibe-eat some great food and you always leave making a friend! The Snappy Dog was so delicious and the French fries/onion rings were cooked to perfection. Definitely come check out Lovely‚Äôs!

Charlotte's Special- Single lovely's patty, American cheese, lots of onions, pickles, and steamed bun, Charlotte's sauce.

Lovely's Snappy Dog- All beef frankfurter, natural casing, caramelized onion-sauerkraut, squishy bun.

French Fries- Lovely's Classic "Sidewinder" Fries. Some might call them a cross between a curly fry and a steak fry!

Onion Rings- Crispy beer-battered onion rings

Double Cheeseburger

Swirl Bundt Cake- Pistachio chocolate swirl bundt cake

Burger and onion rings, please.
That‚Äôs it. That‚Äôs all it takes to make a wandering Brit happy on a Friday afternoon on the eve of St Patrick‚Äôs. Then it‚Äôs off across the road to the bar.
Where better to live this simple dream than in Lovely‚Äôs Old Fashioned?
It‚Äôs tasty, simple, a bit rough and ready, and it hits every greasy spot your soul hungers for.
I had read about Lovely‚Äôs in a food blog and labelled it as a ‚Äòmaybe‚Äô. Its exterior won‚Äôt fill you with confidence the way its food will fill you with joy. Forget about looks, this is the heart of Hell‚Äôs Kitchen, not its face.
I recommend you order in and sit at the small counter inches away from the fry cooks whose brisk direction orchestrate a symphony leading only to clogged arteries.
This might be a once in a lifetime only experience. I‚Äôm not sure my constitution could survive another salvo but wow, oh wow, was that burger tasty.

Google brought me here tonight. Hungry for a burger and someone on TikToc said go here instead of 5 Napkin Burger across the street. It said they are cheaper and better. Okay then! Not overly busy on a Friday night at 7:00 pm. Order at the counter and pull up a stool at the small bar they provide to eat at. Burger was ready promptly, was hot and tasted oh so delicious. Typical greasy spoon diner type burger from childhood that you always hope for! Get a double, patties aren‚Äôt super thick. Place is clean-ish and employees are helpful.

Super friendly people and a fun place to be. Double no bun with mushrooms and onions.

I went back for the triple before my train home.

The burger was good quality but a bit small. Fries were worth it. The place was not crowded so service was fast. The inside is decorated with a diner type vibe but got a little smokey from the burgers.

The cheese burger here is excellent, and a great price. We didn't love the sidewinder fries (just not our style, although I'm sure others would like it.) I'd recommend ordering online or calling and then showing up. The staff were very odd when we were standing there waiting for our food, and it took a very long time to get a simple order of a burger and fries. I'll chalk it up to the weirdness of a. Friday night, but we weren't comfortable hanging around. I'll happily order a burger for pickup in the future.

Absolutely delicious burgers and onion rings. Will be back to try more of the menu. We got the double cheeseburger and the patty melt. Both I would order again, no doubt. The onion rings were perfectly crispy. Next time I'll try the fries and update my review! Open late. Classic taste. Old school vibe!

Friendly staff and decent food, but overpriced ‚Äî $26 for two small burgers and onion rings. Nothing stood out. They don‚Äôt sell seltzer, which they really should add. No beer or alcohol either, but that‚Äôs understandable. Not worth it unless you‚Äôre out of options in this touristy area. I won‚Äôt be back unless prices drop or the economy improves.

I had high hopes, and the food absolutely delivered. The burger was amazing‚Äîjuicy, flavorful, and cooked to perfection. The onion rings had a crispy, well-seasoned batter, and the fries were just the right amount of crispy. On taste alone, this place is easily a 5-star spot.

However, my experience was tainted by the uncomfortable atmosphere created by one of the employees. An older Hispanic male, possibly Colombian, was openly berating his coworker, who was working hard on the grill. It was frustrating and upsetting to witness someone being micromanaged and constantly criticized, especially when they were clearly doing their best. The negative energy took away from the dining experience, making it hard to fully enjoy the meal.

Because of this, I‚Äôm giving it 3 stars. The food is excellent, but the staff dynamic needs serious improvement. Owner, please train your employees better and foster a more positive work environment‚Äîboth for their sake and for your customers‚Äô experience.

Wasn‚Äôt overly taken on the good. Defo had better.
Didn‚Äôt like the fact the two employed were wearing gloves and using this as an excuse not to wash their hands. Not a problem if they changed their gloves but they wernt.

Looking for the best cheese burger in NYC? Well you just found it. These were sensational. I‚Äôm only disappointed I don‚Äôt live here and won‚Äôt be able to come back till my next visit. Bonus points - the side winder fries offered something different (mix between a chip and French fry), cute venue and the staff very friendly.

A great old school burger spot with an updated feel. Charlotte's Special is flavorful and the right balance. Plus the sides are stellar too, and you will never go wrong with the sidewinders and rings. After trying it, I promise you will see why this place is named one of the best hamburgers in the city.

The place is a hole in the wall so grab a seat where you can, but instead download their app and take it to-go, it really does save you time waiting and money and was ready exactly when it was said.

This quaint little hole In the wall is easy to miss. Even though it‚Äôs pretty new, it has the old fashioned lunch counter feel. The burgers are inexpensive if solid quality. $8 for a single burger. Really good stuff. Going to come back for a combo when I don‚Äôt have to run around so much

All I can say is if you get a chance to check this place out, order the burger and onion rings. You will not be disappointed. The burger had tons of flavor and the onion rings could be the best onion rings I ever had (cooked to perfection). I most definitely recommend you try this little burger joint out. There is also four to five diner style seating if you want to eat at Lovely‚Äôs.

I reviewed this place when it first opened and gave it a perfect 5. I keep coming back and they never cease to impress, so I have to update my review with some tips. Almost everything on the menu is excellent but here are some of my favorites:

1) Double cheeseburger - get as is, no frills, just the basics done to perfection. Try and you'll see what I mean

2l Charlotte's special - a good option if you want a single burger balanced with a heavy dose of grilled onion flavor.

3) Patty melt - if you're craving something heavier and cheesier, different, a bit greasier

4) Sides - both the fries and onion rings are a must try. Lovely's has their own great take.

5) Hot dog - surprisingly good! An excellent hot dog if you're craving one

Good spot for a quick burger!

The fries were great, crispy and nicely salted... Semi curly steak fries. The burgers were freshly smashed on the grill right in front of you and the buns were soft.

Would recommend a double, as they are pretty small.

The restaurant itself is very small and has a handful of stools to eat at the counter.

Very solid experience overall. I enjoyed the old fashioned style and appropriately greasy burgers and dogs. It was a very solid dinner and as far as Manhattan prices go, it's not bad at all and one of the more affordable dinners we ate on our NYC trip. Overall, it was a pretty good experience.
Chill neighborhood burger spot. The burger was juicy, but the highlight was the crispy onion rings.

The service was so amazing!!! We were here at 1:30 in the morning and the food was so good and fresh. I believe her name is Blana. She was so warm and on top of it. And the food was so delicious!!! Truly one of the best burgers I have ever had! Such a wonderful NYC experience!

very cool place with an amazing simple cheeseburger! Super tasty! Even though the space is super small it is very organized and clean!! Definitely will be back - but not for the fries which I didn‚Äôt love
Classic crispy burger patties with unique fries for potato lovers everywhere. The bar counter is a nice setup and it feels like a proper blend of old school sensibility and contemporary character.

Really incredible burger spot. Cozy, old fashioned vibe with countertop seating. Both of the guys we dealt with were super friendly and accommodating, the food is fairly priced and DELICIOUS. I‚Äôve had the bacon cheeseburger, fries and hot dog and all three hit the mark. Everything was made to order, and an extra shoutout to the fries for being unique to any other fries I‚Äôve had. This is just good old-fashioned food. No gimmicks, just great taste and service.

Everything I had was amazing. One of the best burger places in NYC for sure.

Onion rings and pistachio cake were shockingly good as well.
